sentences.sContent: Clay said a better law was needed for the return of fugitive slaves to their owners.
sentences.sContent_eng: Clay said a better law was needed for the return of fugitive slaves to their owners.
sentences.sCn: 克莱说，一项好的法律应该是让逃亡的奴隶回到他们的主人手中。

words.tran: 无常的；短暂的；易逃逸的

trans.tranCn: 逃亡的, 无常的, 易变的
trans.tranOther: trying to avoid being caught by the police
